posts.post_content:
Not exactly at an Isamaru-blood level, but still pretty decent.   
  
If they were alone, each of them would be 1/1.66's. Not as good as 2/2's, but if that was the case, a 6/6 for ![4](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=4&type=symbol)![White](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=W&type=symbol) would've been pretty insane.  
  
A decent limited card, not really playable outside of it.
